TopicTitle: The New Navalized Pak-fa T-50N With Wide Drastic Improvements

Articles.Content:
Introducing, the new Pak-fa T-50N! This drastic improvement has several key upgrades including doubled fuel capacity, reinforced air frame, more maneuverability, and much more stability while it is flying, making it my first operational all stock naval aircraft, and it even includes 0.55 tons of dead weight rcs in the nose to be replaced with a payload of equivalent weight. Enjoy guys!

Protoype download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/jlmx8jeon0swqli/Pak-fa%20T-50N.craft
